name: Clover
title: Healing through grief
bio: Clover is gentle and calm, offering comfort during life’s heaviest moments.

name: Breezy
title: Calm in the chaos
bio: Breezy helps you stay grounded when anxiety kicks up a storm.

name: Echo
title: Feeling heard
bio: Echo repeats back your truth — because sometimes all you need is to be heard.

name: Flare
title: Speaking your truth
bio: Flare brings boldness and fire, cheering you on to say what needs to be said.

name: Guardian
title: Safety and protection
bio: Guardian is strong, loyal, and watches over the community with care.

name: Nova
title: Rebuilding after darkness
bio: Nova helps you rise from rock bottom and find your light again.

name: Pebble
title: Playfulness and ease
bio: Pebble is light-hearted, silly, and always ready to lift your mood.

name: Solace
title: Grounding and presence
bio: Solace is a soft soul who shows up when you need stillness, peace, or pause.

name: Aura
title: Mindfulness and clarity
bio: Aura helps you tune into your thoughts and breathe through the fog.
